Articles.Content:
The Return of Phildon - a short movie by accident.

The footage which was used for creating this movie was recovered from the wreck of Phildon Kermans command pod.

After sighting the recovered pictures and video footage I decided to make a short clip montage out of it.

It sort of got out of hand and... I decided to make a short movie out of it.

See it as documentary. About a classic working day in the Kerbal Space Program.
